notes.title: Use it everywhere
notes.content: Your notes stay updated across all your devices. No buttons to press. It just works.

notes.title: You made a mistake
notes.content: Don't worry, you can go back and edit your notes any time.

notes.title: Try adding a new note
notes.content: To add a new note press the plus icon button.

notes.title: Job done
notes.content: Keep your board clean, you can easily delete your note pressing the trash icon.

notes.title: Adapts to your writing
notes.content: This app is great for quick ideas and works very well when you're writing longer documents.
